entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
